channel.title: CTI for STARFACE on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in CTI for STARFACE on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned features of the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App Here you will find all help and learning resources for new and planned features of the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: First steps
item.description: First steps with the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App Here you will find all help and learning resources about the test version, installation and purchase of the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: Working with CTI for STARFACE
item.description: Working with the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App Here you will find all help and learning resources for the correct usage of the Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: Help & Support
item.description: Help & Support We are always happy to take care of your requests, regardless if they are general questions about the BELWARE GmbH and our products or specific questions. Just contact us either via phone or mail. We will get back to you within 1 to 2 business days. For general things you can reach us under: E-Mail: info@belware.de alternatively Phone: +49 2362 788 90 55 Fax: +49 2362 788 90 56

item.title: Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App, each video covers a special topic Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE - Quick Overview
